verses.verse: Now the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1961>used<s%> the <S%H259>same<s%> <S%H8193>language<s%> and the <S%H259>same<s%> <S%H1697>words.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about as they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> <S%H6924>east,<s%> that they <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H1237>plain<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8152>Shinar<s%> and <S%H3427>settled<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H7453>another,<s%> <S%H3051>"Come,<s%> let us <S%H9226>make<s%> <S%H3835>bricks<s%> and <S%H8313>burn<s%> [them] <S%H8316>thoroughly.<s%>" And they <S%H1961>used<s%> <S%H3843>brick<s%> for <S%H68>stone,<s%> and they <S%H1961>used<s%> <S%H2564>tar<s%> for <S%H2563>mortar.<s%>

And they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3051>"Come,<s%> let us <S%H1129>build<s%> for ourselves a <S%H5892>city,<s%> and a <S%H4026>tower<s%> whose <S%H7218>top<s%> [will reach] into <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and let us <S%H6213>make<s%> for ourselves a <S%H8034>name;<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> we be <S%H6327>scattered<s%> abroad <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth.<s%>"

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> and the <S%H4026>tower<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> had <S%H1129>built.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> they are <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> and they <S%H3605>all<s%> have the <S%H259>same<s%> <S%H8193>language.<s%> And <S%H2088>this<s%> is what they <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H6213>do,<s%> and <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H2161>purpose<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> will be <S%H1219>impossible<s%> for them.

<S%H3051>"Come,<s%> let Us <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H1101>confuse<s%> their <S%H8193>language,<s%> that they may not <S%H8085>understand<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> another's <S%H8193>speech.<s%>"

So the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6327>scattered<s%> them abroad from <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth;<s%> and they <S%H2308>stopped<s%> <S%H1129>building<s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> its <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H894>Babel,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1101>confused<s%> the <S%H8193>language<s%> of the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth;<s%> and from <S%H8033>there<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6327>scattered<s%> them abroad <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are [the records of] the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H8035>Shem.<s%> <S%H8035>Shem<s%> was one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> and <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H775>Arpachshad<s%> two <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3999>flood;<s%>

and <S%H8035>Shem<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H775>Arpachshad,<s%> and he <S%H3205>had<s%> [other] <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
And <S%H775>Arpachshad<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> thirty-five <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H7974>Shelah;<s%>

and <S%H775>Arpachshad<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H7974>Shelah,<s%> and he <S%H3205>had<s%> [other] <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
And <S%H7974>Shelah<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5677>Eber;<s%>

and <S%H7974>Shelah<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5677>Eber,<s%> and he <S%H3205>had<s%> [other] <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
And <S%H5677>Eber<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> thirty-four <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H6389>Peleg;<s%>

and <S%H5677>Eber<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H6389>Peleg,<s%> and he <S%H3205>had<s%> [other] <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
And <S%H6389>Peleg<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H7466>Reu;<s%>

and <S%H6389>Peleg<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H7466>Reu,<s%> and he <S%H3205>had<s%> [other] <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
And <S%H7466>Reu<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> thirty-two <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H8286>Serug;<s%>

and <S%H7466>Reu<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H8286>Serug,<s%> and he <S%H3205>had<s%> [other] <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
And <S%H8286>Serug<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5152>Nahor;<s%>

and <S%H8286>Serug<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5152>Nahor,<s%> and he <S%H3205>had<s%> [other] <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
And <S%H5152>Nahor<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> twenty-nine <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H8646>Terah;<s%>

and <S%H5152>Nahor<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8672>nineteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H8646>Terah,<s%> and he <S%H3205>had<s%> [other] <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
And <S%H8646>Terah<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H87>Abram,<s%> <S%H5152>Nahor<s%> and <S%H2039>Haran.<s%>

Now <S%H428>these<s%> are [the records of] the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H8646>Terah.<s%> <S%H8646>Terah<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H87>Abram,<s%> <S%H5152>Nahor<s%> and <S%H2039>Haran;<s%> and <S%H2039>Haran<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3876>Lot.<s%>
And <S%H2039>Haran<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of his father <S%H1>Terah<s%> in the <S%H8646>land<s%> of his <S%H776>birth,<s%> in <S%H4138>Ur<s%> of the <S%H218>Chaldeans.<s%>

And <S%H87>Abram<s%> and <S%H5152>Nahor<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> for themselves. The <S%H8034>name<s%> of Abram's <S%H802>wife<s%> was <S%H8297>Sarai;<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of Nahor's <S%H802>wife<s%> was <S%H4435>Milcah,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H2039>Haran,<s%> the father of <S%H1>Milcah<s%> and <S%H4435>Iscah.<s%>
And <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> was <S%H6135>barren;<s%> she <S%H369>had<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2056>child.<s%>

And <S%H8646>Terah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H3876>Lot<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2039>Haran,<s%> his <S%H1121>grandson,<s%> and <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> his daughter-in-law, his <S%H1121>son<s%> Abram's <S%H802>wife;<s%> and they <S%H3318>went<s%> out <S%H854>together<s%> from <S%H218>Ur<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> in order to <S%H1980>enter<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan;<s%> and they <S%H935>went<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H2771>Haran,<s%> and <S%H3427>settled<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>
And the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H8646>Terah<s%> were two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years;<s%> and <S%H8646>Terah<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> in <S%H2771>Haran.<s%>
